sect1.title: ERASE
sect1.para: Erase the given number of items from the current location (data point) of the built-in data array.
TODO: Clarify size information and include as a configuration option.
This command is used in conjunction with record, recall and resetdp

itemizedlist.para: <num-items> - the number of items to erase

sect2.title: Example
sect2.programlisting: ... ; Gather a day's worth of 10 minute data ; (To be collected at a later time) resetdp erase 24 * 6 ; This expression will be resolved at compile time repeat 24 * 6 [ record sensor1 wait 10 * 60 * 10 ] ; Wait for the user to press a button connected to switch2 waituntil [switch2] resetdp repeat 24 * 6 [ send tostring recall send '\n' ] ...
